props.name: container-color-background
props.comment: Shared background color for all components visually represent a container. The container should contain content and is most likely layered on top of a contrasting background color. Not limited to in-flow content, can be used for out-of-flow content such as popups.

props.name: container-text-color
props.comment: Shared text color for all components visually represent a container. The text must sit on top of `*-s-container-background-color`

props.name: container-color-border
props.comment: Shared border color for all components visually represent a container. The border color must be coupled with `*-s-container-background-color`

props.name: container-sizing-border
props.comment: Shared border size for all components visually represent a container.

props.name: container-radius-border
props.comment: Shared border radius for all components visually represent a container.

props.name: container-shadow
props.comment: Shared shadow for all components visually represent a container.

props.name: container-spacing-inline
props.comment: Shared inline spacing for all components visually represent a container.

props.name: container-spacing-block
props.comment: Shared block spacing for all components visually represent a container.
